dmca.title: [ABUSE] Re: WH#003 - WHITE STRIPES / Blue Orchid - Hosted Infringements]

nc

From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 25, 2005 7:48 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Re: WH#003 - WHITE STRIPES / Blue Orchid - Hosted
Infringements]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----

For your review.
- --

The Planet Internet Services, Inc.

- -------- Original Message --------

lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 22 Apr 2005 14:46:28 -0000

mail with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50) id
1DOzQC-00000K-97 for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 22 Apr 2005 09:46:20 -0500

mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from PPWEB3@aol.com) with esmtp
(Exim) id 1DOzQ6-000BYQ-TW for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 22 Apr 2005
09:46:18 -0500
Received:         from PPWEB3@aol.com by imo-d21.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v38.7.)
id j.8b.25da63e3 (4380) for <abuse@theplanet.com>; Fri, 22 Apr 2005
10:46:03 -0400 (EDT)
From:         PPWEB3@aol.com

*Web Sheriff**
*Protecting Your Rights on the Internet
*Tel** 44-(0)208-323 8013 / Fax 44-(0)208-323 8080
*websheriff@websheriff.com  www.websheriff.com */ /**/_SUMMARY
NOTIFICATION___/*


*/  1./* Rights Owner/ /: */BEGGARS GROUP DIGITAL LIMITED/*

*/  2./* Rights Agent : */WEB SHERIFF/*

*/  3./* Infringed Rights : */COPYRIGHT & TRADEMARK/*

*/  4./* Infringed Artist : */WHITE STRIPES/*

*/  5. /*Infringed Title : *"/Blue Orchid/"/ (TRACK),/ "/Get Behind Me
Satan/" (ALBUM)*

*/  6./* Infringing Activity : */MP3 DOWNLOADING/*

*/  7./* Infringing Web Address:
*/www.highfiber.org/exclusive.php?s=eownloads&ss=&a=view&id=138&o=&anon=1/*

*/_FULL / LEGAL NOTIFICATION_/**/__/*

*/  Dear Sirs,
/*
~  Please be advised that /Web Sheriff/ represents /Beggars Group Digital
Limited/ (hereinafter referred to as "/BGDL/") in relation to - /inter alia/
- the above matter.

~  Please be further advised that our said clients own or otherwise control
the international trademark */WHITE STRIPES/* (hereinafter referred to as
the "Trademark), together with the copyright in the various master
recordings commercially recorded by */WHITE STRIPES/*, including, but not
limited to, the master recordings comprising the said artist's forthcoming
album "*/GET BEHIND ME SATAN/*" (hereinafter referred to as the "Masters"),
together with the copyright in certain of the musical compositions variously
recorded by */WHITE STRIPES/* (hereinafter referred to as the
"Compositions"), together with the goodwill in and associated with the
business trading under the name */WHITE STRIPES/* (hereinafter referred to
as the "Goodwill)".

~  We understand that your company*/ (a) /*would appear to be the registered
host of the*/ /**/website specified in the SUMMARY NOTIFICATION above
/*trading from the so-called */domain specified in the SUMMARY NOTIFICATION
above/* (hereinafter referred to as the "Infringing Site") and*/ (b)/* the
Infringing Site would appear to have utilised your hosting services to trade
by usage of the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill by
way of offering */aa)/* free downloads of Masters and / or */bb)/* CDs' of
the Masters for sale, all without the authority or permission of our client.
The said activities are a clear and flagrant breach of  -/ inter alia/ - our
client's proprietary rights in and to the Trademark, the Masters, the
Compositions and the Goodwill

~  In consequence of the foregoing - and in order to mitigate the serious
and on-going damage suffered by our client - we would ask you to immediately
comply with the following instructions:-

*/  1./* All trading using the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and
the Goodwill /via/ your hosting services (whether by the Infringing Site or
otherwise) must cease.

*/  2./* All other exploitation and / or use of the Trademark, the Masters,
the Compositions and the Goodwill /via/ your hosting services must cease
including, but not limited to, so-called 'free-down-loading'
and / or so-called 'streaming' (as applicable).

*/  3./* Final accounts relating to all income derived pursuant to your
direct and / or indirect use of the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions
and the Goodwill must be prepared and furnished to our clients together with
all monies thereby shown to have been earned by such activities (as
applicable).

~ */ 4./* All relevant, so-called 'rights collection societies' must be paid
in full for the mechanical reproduction and / or public performance of the
Masters, the Compositions and all other copyright works (as
applicable) pursuant to the aforementioned activities.

~ */ 5./* Your domestic and overseas licensees and / or distributors and /
or so-called 'ISPs' and / or associates (as applicable) must be notified of
the foregoing and must likewise be obliged to comply with the instructions
herein contained.

~ */ 6. /*You must undertake to take out half-page advertisements in
/Billboard Magazine, Music Week Magazine /and/ Music & Media Magazine/
within fourteen (14) days of the date hereof clarifying the fact that
*/(a)/* your illegal hosting of the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions
and the Goodwill was not authorised by or otherwise associated with our
client, */(b)/* the services offered by the Infringing Site under the
Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill were not offered
by or on behalf of our client and */(c)/* the Infringing Site is no longer
trading either under or otherwise by use of the Trademark, the Masters, the
Compositions and the Goodwill /via/ your hosting services. Furthermore, the
said advertisement must include an apology to our clients.

*/  7./* You must undertake to execute such documentation as may be
reasonably required by our client in order to give proper effect to the
instructions contained herein.

~  In addition to the foregoing - and in accordance with recent /US & UK/
judicial rulings in favour of the /RIAA /and/ BPI /respectively - we would
ask you to provide us */_by return_/* with the full contact details of the
Infringing Site and its owners. Should you fail to do so, our clients would
then look to yourselves for compensation and, in such circumstances, we
would ask you to provide us with the substantive details of the means by
which you propose to compensate our clients for the clear and flagrant
breaches of our client's intellectual property rights in the Trademark, the
Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill.
In this regard we would highlight the fact that our clients have invested
heavily in the Trademark, the Masters, the Compositions and the Goodwill
over a period of several years : as such, any proposals for compensation
must seek to both address and redress the same.

~  Should you be unwilling or otherwise unable to comply with the foregoing,
we must ask you provide the name and address of the domestic attorneys and
/UK/ solicitors whom you intend to instruct in relation to this matter for
the purposes of accepting the service of such proceedings as our appointed
litigators would issue against -/ inter alia/ - yourselves on behalf of our
clients in such an event. Should we fail to hear from you in this regard,
such proceedings would then be served directly upon your  trading premises /
registered offices (as applicable).

~  Whilst writing, we would also caution you against 'posting' or otherwise
communicating any correspondence and / or remarks to third parties which
could in any way be construed as being defamatory of any officers of our
client or otherwise constitute a malicious falsehood injurious to our
clients' business.

~  Notwithstanding the foregoing, all rights of /Beggars Group Digital
Limited/ and /White Stripes/ - including, but not limited to, the right to
apply for injunctive relief and damages without further notice or recourse
to you - are hereby strictly reserved.

~  /Yours faithfully,

~  *Deborah Sykes
~  for and on behalf of
~  *//*_WEB SHERIFF___
*/
